title: Set Up Your Wallet
text: Once you've set up your wallet of choice, connect it to BULLSclub by clicking the wallet icon in the top right corner or by web3 Login.

title: Creat Your NFTs
text: Click Create and Mint your NFT. Add a Name and a description. Creating an NFT is free, Only pay network fees

title: Get your NFTs
text: Find your new minted nft in your wallet and profile page

title: List NFT For Sale
text: Sell your NFT from your profile page, Approve and list your NFT for sale!
